constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数限制为 n 次

constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 查询的路径必须包含恰好 k 条边，否则返回 -1
constraints.formal: if path(u, v) has exactly k edges, return XOR of weights; otherwise, return -1

constraints.name: xor_operation
constraints.description: 查询结果是路径上所有节点权重的异或值
constraints.formal: result = w[u] ⊕ w[v] ⊕ ... (all nodes on the path from u to v)

constraints.name: tree_connectivity
constraints.formal: edges form a connected acyclic graph (tree)
